Tensor Class Reference
Space (Vector, Tensor)

Detailed Description

A Tensor represents a Cartesian tensor.

Definition at line 30 of file Tensor.h.

#include <Tensor.h>

Tensor & dyad ( const Vector &  v1,
const Vector &  v2 
) [inline]

Create dyad of two vectors.

Upon return, *this equals the dyad v1 ^ v2. Equivalenty, (*this)(i , j) == v1[i]*v2[j]

Parameters:
v1vector input
v2vector input
Returns:
reference to this tensor
